alert.note: Alert for Crowley County Including Ordway; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 14 at 5:23PM MST until December 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag warning remains in effect for Wednesday from 10 AM to 5 PM for VERY STRONG winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 228 through 237, which includes Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties, and additionally is now in effect for fire weather zones 226 and 227, which includes El Paso County... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 226...227...228...229...230...231 AND 232... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 226...227...228...229... 230...231 and 232. * Winds...West 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 85 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
